api

Class Job<V,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Job<V,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Return value from the task executed.
    R - Return value of the solution from the job
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EuclideanTSPJob, MandelbrotSetJob

    public abstract class Job<V,R>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class for Task T
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      abstract R calculateSolution()
      Calculates the solution of the job given the results of the tasks.
      abstract void createTasks()
      Divides current Job into smaller tasks which is able to be computed in simultaneously and thereafter compute a solution based on those results.

    • Method Detail

      • createTasks

        public abstract void createTasks()
        Divides current Job into smaller tasks which is able to be computed in simultaneously and thereafter compute a solution based on those results.

      • calculateSolution

        public abstract R calculateSolution()
                             throws NotEnoughResultsException
        Calculates the solution of the job given the results of the tasks. If not enough results are available an exception wil be thrown.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResultsException
